body.p: A boxed filter offers a visual representation of collection filtering. The top part is an expression that is the collection to be filtered. The bottom part, between the square brackets, holds the filter expression.
The example below is an alternative way of defining logic as .

Furthermore, the filter expression brings a reserved keyword item. Using this keyword you can explicitly access items from the filtered collection. Its benefit can be seen more for collections of simple data types (numbers, strings, etc.).
